text: - So I have a microphone here
because I'm told that, after you'd work for the day,
y'all would go out and sing karaoke songs,
and there's a song-- what is your go-to song?
- My go-to song is "Gangsta's Paradise"
by Coolio.
- Okay, well...
[cheers and applause]
I think it's--I think you should sing it for us.
- Okay. - Okay.
[cheers and applause]
Just me? - I don't know it.
- Oh, gosh, okay.
Well, luckily, this is not singing,
so this is rapping.
tWitch, you can come out here and help me as well if you--
Oh, no, it's just me. - Yeah, go ahead.
- Go ahead. - Just me.
[flowing hip-hop music]
Sing along if you guys know it.
- Yup, yup.
[audience clapping rhythmically]
Oh, a little intro. - Uh-huh, yup.
- Look how-- look how cool I am.
[rapping] As I walked through the valley
Of the shadow of death
I take a look at my life
And realize there's nothing left
'Cause I've been brassing and laughing so long that
Even my mama thinks that my mind is gone
But I ain't never crossed a man that didn't deserve it
He be treated like a punk
You know that's unheard of
You better watch the way you're talking
And where you're walking
Or you and your homeys might be lined in chalk
I really hate to trip but I got to luck
As I croak I see myself in the pistol smoke, fool
I'm the kind of G
That little homeys want to be like
On my knees in the night
Saying prayers in the street light
[cheers and applause]
Good thing-- - That's wonderful.
"Pitch Perfect 2"-- it opens everywhere Friday.
We'll be right back. Brittany, thank you so much.
[cheers and applause]
Uh-oh, did you want to see more videos?
Hold on.
- What's happening in your mind right now, Sophia Grace?
Express everything you've ever thought.
- Pink! - Good girl, good girl.
- [laughing]
[cheers and applause]
- She's thinking in color.
